column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Leroy - Thanks for your review. I'm a little confused by your review. You said you ordered a Chicken Chashu Bowl
column2: but received an item that "looked like dog food
column3: but on a plate next to some rice." I fear you may have been given a Tokyo Curry Rice
column5: does not have the most appealing appearance
column6: though its contents and flavor profile do match traditional Japanese curry.
